0.cdata!:
Projet d'Appui au Programme
            National de Développement Participatif au Cameroun - Phase deuxième

theme: Improving labor markets,Municipal governance and institution building,Participation and civic engagement,Rural services and infrastructure,Other environment and natural resources management

abstracts.cdata!:
The objective of the Second Phase of the
            Community Development Program Support Project for Cameroon
            is to improve the delivery of specified basic social
            services in targeted communes, and extend the ongoing
            process in support to decentralization to new regions. Since
            its beginning this project implemented the following
            improvements: better access to school for children, better
            access to health services, better access to drinking water,
            new roads have been built.
